Brokeface is a goblin raider bosses that can be summoned after slaying 15 goblins within the Goblin Village. He uses melee attacks. Upon arrival he shouts "Stabbin' time!" and other phrases. This goblin boss will always drop a piece of equipment and one other non-equippable item.

Contents

  • 1 Drops
    • 1.1 100% drop
    • 1.2 Main drops
    • 1.3 Tertiary drop
    • 1.4 Universal drops
  • 2 Achievements
  • 3 Update history

Universal drops[edit | edit source]

Universal drops are dropped by nearly every monster and skilling action outside of Daemonheim.
These items are dropped alongside main drops.
Item Quantity Rarity GE price High Alch
Key token1RareNot soldNot alchemisable
Mimic kill token (m)11/10,00079,184Not alchemisable

Achievements[edit | edit source]

  • Like a Boss ( 5) – Kill a goblin raider boss in the Goblin Village.
  • Guardian of the Realm ( 0) – Obtained a collection of unique drops from Slayer monsters located within Asgarnia & Misthalin.
    • Goblin mail and goblin book drops
